meanings: (온 정성과 노력) the[one's] best, the[one's] utmost

vlive.korean: 이런 노래가 최선인가요? Is this song your best? 듣기 View video EXO : 다 들어와
마지막까지 한번 최선을 다해서 열심히... Until the last, we'll do our best. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 스키즈 옥상토크♡
vlive.english: Until the last, we'll do our best.

vlive.korean: 최선을 다해서 해야겠다 싶어서 엄청... I just thought I really should do my best. 듣기 View video TWICE : 🤭😐🔋❌
vlive.english: I just thought I really should do my best.

vlive.korean: 무슨 일이든 최선을 다하면 다 할만하겠죠? Everything is worth trying if you try your best at it, right? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [RADIO] 캐럿들 귀대귀대 #82
vlive.english: Everything is worth trying if you try your best at it, right?

vlive.korean: 최선을 다해볼게요! I'll try my best! 듣기 View video SSONGYANG : 11학번이 20학번에게 주는 꿀팁가득한 #개강메이크업 #데일리메이크업 | 쏭냥

examples.korean: He did his best to avert suspicion. 발음듣기 그는 의심을 피하기 위해 최선을 다했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He did his best to avert suspicion. 발음

examples.korean: We’ll manage as best we can. 발음듣기 최선을 다해 해 보겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll manage as best we can. 발음

examples.korean: One tries one’s best. 발음듣기 사람들은 최선을 다하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
The manager is expected to use his or her best endeavours to promote the artist’s career. 발음듣기 매니저는 예술가의 경력을 향상시킬 수 있도록 최선의 노력을 다해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The manager is expected to use his or her best endeavours to promote the artist’s career. 발음

examples.korean: She tried her best to solve the problem. 발음듣기 그녀는 그 문제를 풀려고 최선을 다해 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She tried her best to solve the problem. 발음
